text: Anatole Borisovich Katok (; August 9, 1944 – April 30, 2018) was an Russian- American mathematician. Katok was the Director of the Center for Dynamics and Geometry at the Pennsylvania State University. His field of research was the theory of dynamical systems. ==References== ==Other websites== * Anatole Katok – Google Scholar Citations * List of Fellows of the American Mathematical Society Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American mathematicians Category:Educators from Washington, D.C. title: Anatole Katok
